sql.if: AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM `organization_attribute` attr WHERE attr.`object_id` = e.`object_id` AND attr.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND attr.`attribute_type_id` = 903 AND attr.`value_id` IS NOT NULL)

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT o.`object_id` FROM `organization` o JOIN `organization_attribute` a ON (o.`object_id` = a.`object_id` AND a.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND a.`attribute_type_id` = 901) JOIN `organization_string_culture` sc ON (a.`value_id` = sc.`id` AND sc.`value` = #{code} AND sc.`locale_id` = (SELECT l.`id` FROM `locales` l WHERE l.`system` = 1)) WHERE o.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE')

SELECT DISTINCT o.`object_id` FROM `organization` o JOIN `organization_attribute` a ON (o.`object_id` = a.`object_id` AND a.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND a.`attribute_type_id` = 900) JOIN `organization_string_culture` sc ON (a.`value_id` = sc.`id` AND sc.`locale_id` = #{localeId} AND sc.`value` = #{name}) WHERE o.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE')

SELECT o.`object_id` FROM `organization` o LEFT JOIN `organization_attribute` oa ON (oa.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND oa.`object_id` = o.`object_id` AND oa.`attribute_type_id` = 903) WHERE oa.`value_id` = #{parentId} AND o.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE')

SELECT DISTINCT o.`object_id`, o.`permission_id` FROM `organization` o LEFT JOIN `organization_attribute` oa ON (oa.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND oa.`object_id` = o.`object_id` AND oa.`attribute_type_id` = 903) WHERE oa.`value_id` = #{parentId} AND o.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE')
mapper.update:
UPDATE `organization` e SET e.`status` = #{status} WHERE e.`object_id` IN
#{id}
AND
e.`status` = 'ACTIVE'
e.`status` = 'INACTIVE'
mapper.select: select osc.`value` from `organization_attribute` oa left join `organization_string_culture` osc on (oa.`value_id` = osc.`id` and oa.`value_type_id` = 900) where oa.`object_id` = #{id} and osc.`locale_id` = (select l.id from locales l where l.system is true) and oa.`status` = 'ACTIVE'
